articles.description: Jerry Seinfeld looked like a man who was cooped up for a year Friday night as he christened the coming-out-of-the-pandemic Gotham Comedy Club in NYC, and the audience "exploded!'

articles.title: There's nothing wrong with being "California sober" — Demi Lovato's haters be darned - Salon
articles.description: As a recovery advocate, I know everyone's recovery journey is different — and it's okay to not be fully substance-abstinent
articles.content: Demi Lovato is no longer hiding her truth. Last month the singer and actress, who has struggled with addiction for years, revealed that she considers herself "California sober" — meaning not fully ab… [+7434 chars]
